tenders.title: Supply and Delivery of Medical Equipment for Regional Hospitals
tenders.organization: Ministry of Health and Social Services
tenders.description: The Ministry of Health and Social Services invites qualified suppliers to submit bids for the supply and delivery of medical equipment including patient monitors, ultrasound machines, and laboratory equipment for five regional hospitals. Equipment must meet international standards and include warranty and maintenance support.

tenders.title: Construction of 50km Gravel Road in Kunene Region
tenders.description: Construction of approximately 50 kilometers of gravel road connecting three rural villages in the Kunene Region. Work includes clearing, earthworks, drainage structures, and gravel surfacing. Contractor must have demonstrated experience in rural road construction and possess appropriate equipment.

tenders.title: Provision of Security Services for Government Buildings
tenders.description: The Ministry requires professional security services for five government office buildings in Windhoek. Services include 24-hour manned security, access control, CCTV monitoring, and emergency response. Service provider must be registered with Security Industry Regulatory Authority and have valid insurance.

tenders.title: Supply of Office Furniture for New Administration Building
tenders.description: Supply and installation of office furniture including desks, chairs, filing cabinets, and conference tables for new four-story administration building. Furniture must be ergonomic, durable, and suitable for professional office environment. Installation and five-year warranty required.

tenders.title: Annual Financial Audit Services for Regional Council
tenders.description: The Regional Council invites proposals from registered audit firms to conduct annual financial audits for the 2024/2025 fiscal year. Scope includes audit of financial statements, internal controls review, and compliance testing. Firm must be registered with Public Accountants and Auditors Board.

tenders.title: Rehabilitation of School Buildings in Kavango East Region
tenders.organization: Ministry of Education, Arts and Culture
tenders.description: Rehabilitation and repair works for four primary school buildings including roof repairs, painting, plumbing fixes, and electrical installations. Work must be completed during school holidays. Contractor must provide detailed work schedule and quality assurance plan.

tenders.title: Procurement of Agricultural Inputs for Smallholder Farmers
tenders.organization: Ministry of Agriculture, Water and Land Reform
tenders.description: Supply of agricultural inputs including certified seeds, fertilizers, and pesticides for distribution to smallholder farmers. Products must be registered with relevant authorities and suitable for semi-arid conditions. Supplier must provide storage and distribution support.

tenders.title: IT Support and Maintenance Services for Municipal Systems
tenders.description: Comprehensive IT support services including helpdesk support, server maintenance, network management, and system upgrades. Service provider must have certified technicians and provide 24/7 emergency support. Three-year contract with optional extension.
